goal: Discuss the following scenario as if it happened to you: Robin went to Las Vegas and risked her husbands entire savings account on the roulette table.
scenario_instructions: When you start the chat, you will be given a scenario to discuss. For example, you may have the scenario “I lost my keys this morning. It was very stressful.” During the conversation, please talk as though you have experienced the scenario given. For this scenario, you might say something like “I had such a stressful morning! I couldn’t find my keys anywhere.” The goal of this task is to evaluate how well the chatbot understands common social scenarios.
